qas.question: HD content can be displayed by cable-ready TVs without using what?
Without using an external box, cable-ready TVs can display what?
What features allow the cable-ready TVs to display HD content without an external box?

answers.text: a QAM tuner built-in and/or a card slot for inserting a CableCARD

qas.question: What kind of built-in tuner will allow a cable-ready TV to display HD content without an external box?
What kind of card will allow a cable-ready TV to display HD content without an external box?
